name: Paradome
headline: Rapid AI development & deployment for government
description:
Paradome delivers rapid prototyping, deployment, and optimization of AI automations for government agencies. 

Government AI procurement mirrors outdated IT practices—pay millions, wait years. The high cost and long timelines stem from (1) building data integrations, labeling operations, and compliance mechanisms from scratch, (2) lack of AI expertise among traditional contractors,  (3) minimal input from end-users during development, and (4) the ongoing expense of monitoring, maintaining, and updating bespoke systems. 

Paradome brings the time and cost of deploying compliant AI to near-zero, enabling agencies to spend time and money on iteration rather than development.

Agencies need a single, versatile environment that combines agile low-code tools with full-code extensibility. Paradome’s NOVA modularizes data integration, pipeline optimization, accuracy testing, federal compliance, and real-time monitoring, eliminating bottlenecks and accelerating AI deployment.

Sam's ex-girlfriend introduced him to Greg back at Carnegie Mellon in 2017, and while that relationship didn't last, their friendship has. After college, Greg went to Harvard Law School, while Sam worked for three years at Jane Street, building & leading a satellite dev team.

Agencies provide public services and enforce the law. With AI, their work can be consistent, impartial, and efficient. Making government work is not a political choice—it’s a civic duty.

founders.name: Greg Volynsky, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CEO of Paradome

At Harvard Law School, I focused on constitutional law, comparative electoral systems, and avoiding contract law

interested in 20th century political history, Soviet bard music & climbing

founders.name: Sam Damashek, Founder
founders.description:
Sam is the co-founder and CTO of Paradome.

He worked for three years at Jane Street on the options trading desk writing algorithmic strategies using applied ML, for two years in NYC and then one year in Hong Kong, where he built out a satellite dev team for the Asia options markets.

He graduated with a BS in Computer Science from CMU, where for some reason he led a fledging constitutional law debate team, never to victory though frequently to Ohio.

# Don’t build from scratch.AI for government, fast.
![Network visualization](https://paradome.com/hero.svg)[Backed by ![YC Logo](https://paradome.com/yc.svg)](https://paradome.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/paradome>)
# Adaptive Agents
## Build + Deploy:
With our platform, rapidly build + deploy AI agents.
## Tool Use:
Our agents can easily integrate with tools & environments, including internal organizational tools.
## Learning + Improvement:
Users provide simple, straightforward feedback. Fast, measurable improvement in task performance.
## Monitor + Comply:
We are FedRamp compliant, and we make it easy to continuously monitor performance / ensure compliance.
## Integrated Development Environment (IDE)
### Data processing: 
leverage pre-built data ingestion (ETL/ELT) pipeline, data pre-processing, and structuring frameworks.
### AI development: 
leverage NOVA labeling tools, compliant models, testing frameworks, and continuous performance logs.
![Flow Diagram](https://paradome.com/_next/image?url=%2Flow-code-diagram.png&w=1920&q=100)![Second Flow Diagram](https://paradome.com/_next/image?url=%2Flow-code-code.png&w=1920&q=100)
![Data Integration Visualization](https://paradome.com/circles.svg)
## Connect data once, use infinitely
We connect with your existing data stores to pull all your data into one place. See all your data from one dashboard. Build new use cases with the same data instantly.
## Headache-free compliance
Comply with security (FedRAMP certified) and AI requirements. Our explainability, interpretability, and logging features help you comply with AI governance requirements.
![Trace Display Diagram](https://paradome.com/_next/image?url=%2Ftrace-display.png&w=3840&q=100)
![Monitoring Visualization](https://paradome.com/_next/image?url=%2Fmonitoring.png&w=1920&q=100)
## Real-Time Performance Insights
Track model accuracy, monitor system health, and spot trends - all from a single dashboard.

generated_description:
**Paradome: Redefining Government AI Deployment**

Paradome is on a mission to transform how government agencies develop and deploy artificial intelligence. Founded in 2024, this dynamic startup aims to expedite AI integration, making it rapid, cost-effective, and compliant with regulatory standards. Operating out of New York and part of Y Combinator Batch S24, Paradome is a small team of three driven by a shared vision.

**The Problem With Traditional Government AI Procurement**

Government procurement for AI has long been bogged down by outdated IT practices. The typical process is painfully slow and expensive—agencies often spend millions and wait for years, only to end up with complex systems that are hard to maintain. This inefficiency arises from several factors:
1. Building data integrations and compliance systems from scratch.
2. A lack of deep AI expertise among conventional contractors.
3. Minimal user feedback during development.
4. Continuous costs related to monitoring and maintaining custom solutions.

**Paradome's Solution: Near-Zero Deployment Cost and Time**

Paradome's innovative platform dramatically reduces the time and financial investment required for compliant AI deployment. By creating a modular environment—dubbed NOVA—Paradome addresses these pain points head-on. NOVA combines low-code tools with full-code extensibility, streamlining the entire process of data integration, optimization, compliance, and real-time monitoring. This means agencies can focus on improving services through iteration rather than getting stuck in the development phase.

**The Power of Adaptive Agents**

Here's how it works: Paradome allows agencies to easily build and deploy AI agents that can integrate seamlessly with existing tools. These agents collect user feedback, ensuring fast and measurable improvements in performance. The platform is already FedRamp compliant, facilitating ongoing monitoring and compliance with necessary regulations.

**Key Features of Paradome’s Offerings:**

- **Integrated Development Environment (IDE):** Offers a suite of tools for data processing and AI development, leveraging pre-built pipelines and compliance models.
- **Data Integration:** Connects existing data stores, enabling agencies to streamline their data accessibility.
- **Compliance Made Simple:** Provides features for meeting AI governance requirements, including explainability and interpretability.
- **Real-Time Monitoring:** Offers insights into model accuracy and system health from an intuitive dashboard.

**Conclusion**

As agencies strive to deliver consistent and efficient public services, Paradome is making that not only possible but also practical. By rethinking the AI integration process, Paradome is enhancing the governmental landscape, emphasizing that making government work isn’t just an option—it’s a civic duty. Visit [Paradome](https://paradome.com) to learn more. 

With Paradome, government AI isn’t just a possibility—it’s an accelerating reality.
